function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inefficient operation of uv-c system in the event of air flow stoppage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on specific operating conditions for uv-c system efficiency","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited efficiency of conventional t8 fluorescent tubes in uv-c range","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of uv-c system efficiency on air flow resistance and mechanical effects on lamps","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluorescent lamp efficiency falling below 70% in uv-c range at low temperatures and airflow","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortened life cycle of fluorescent lamps due to excessive switching cycles","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant power consumption and economic costs associated with uv-c system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term operation of uv-c system without proper maintenance and regulation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogens transmitted through the air","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variety of pathogens sensitive to uv-c radiation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of inactivation rate on pathogen type and environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of germicidal irradiation in building operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate knowledge of germicidal irradiation extent in slovakia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unrealistic assumptions about the end of the pandemic peak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High international mobility of people posing a difficult-to-predict risk.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenge in achieving community immunity through vaccination due to rejection of vaccines and high pre-vaccination rate requirement.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus from humans to humans through infectious droplets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic patients with covid-19 releasing infectious droplets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased recreational activity during the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substitution of prohibited indoor activities with outdoor activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical data on the impact of systemic shifts in urban design on inhabitants","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to green space may lead to unequal recreational opportunities and potential conflicts of interest.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of disease transmission through overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of reduced beneficial health effects due to overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of long-term resilience against future shocks being compromised by overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of equal adoption of strava across cycling and pedestrian communities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of distinction between cyclists and pedestrians in ground-truth reference counters","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mitigation of mental health burden under pandemic conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias in strava adoption along socio-economic gradients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogenous strava adoption over the city of oslo","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data from low-income and marginal groups during the lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Closeness to urban nature impacting physical activity among vulnerable groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cycling activities on city trails with >75% tree canopy cover.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cyclist activity in green areas during lockdown may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from work-related commutes to recreational cycling outside the more densely built city center may lead to higher risk of disease transmission in recreational areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensified recreational activity in urban periphery","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Greater pedestrian activity in green spaces and parks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interrupted weekly rhythm of recreational activity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in diurnal activity patterns during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less pronounced shift in weekday vs weekend activity during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rise in unemployment and flexible work schedules leading to changes in recreational behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density near recreational trail segments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in cycling activity during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and analysis of environmental covariates for each trail segment may lead to exposure to outdoor contaminants and pathogens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of dsm and dtm data provided by the norwegian mapping authority may lead to potential data privacy and security risks if not handled appropriately.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of google earth engine gee cloud computing platform may pose data security and privacy risks if adequate safeguards are not implemented.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing activity levels during lockdown to baseline may not account for the impact of abnormal weather variations on recreational activity.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deviation in recreational activity levels during lockdown may not align with predicted levels based on weather conditions, leading to inaccurate assessments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for spatial covariates and their impact on recreational activity assessment during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
